id.description: Unique identifier for the entity (e.g., DID, public key, organizational ID)

type.description: Type of the entity (e.g., DID, person, organization, or service)

name.description: Name of the entity responsible for generation

url.description: URL or identifier for the entity

role.description: Role of the entity in the generation process

verificationMethod.description: Method to verify the identity of the entity (e.g., DID, public key, or cryptographic method)
